course-selector.title: Choose the courses
course-selector.noOptions: No options, select a degree first

changelog-dialog.title: Changelog
content: - Download of calendar with the selected shifts
- Occupation of the shift (not updated automatically)
- CTRL+Click on a shift to access course page

actions.save-as-excel: Save schedule and classes as Excel file
actions.get-calendar: Obtain calendar file with the classes

classes.error: Could not fetch classes for this course

alert.link-obtained: Success! The link was copied to your clipboard
alert.no-shift-selected: You haven't selected any shift, do your schedule first
alert.schedule-to-excel: Schedule and classes converted into a excel file
alert.cannot-obtain-degrees: It was not possible to obtain the degrees
alert.cannot-obtain-courses: It was not possible to obtain the courses of this degree
alert.cannot-obtain-shifts: It was not possible to obtain the shifts of this course

warning.title: Warnings: Calendar, Occupation and Shifts with different Degrees
content: The file of the calendar with the classes is not updated automatically, make sure to verify every now and then on Fenix if any class has changed.
The shift's occupation data is not obtained in real time, so whenever you want to know the real value you need to reload the page.

Some shifts from Fenix belong to degrees that do not correspond to the one selected, make sure that the class belongs to the degree that you are going to enrol using the functionality "$t(schedule-selected.actions.get-classes)".
